 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==grain== (of sand), si vera lectio (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעָה‎</span>, ***seed*** (of melon, etc.), ***coin***, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעָא‎</span> ***coin***); — only feminine plural suffix: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְהִי כַחוֺל זֵרְעֶ֔ךָ וְצֶאֱצָאֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֶיךָ כִּמְעֹתָיוּ‎</span> [[Isa.48.19|Isa 48:19]] ***and thy seed had been like the sand, and the offspring of thy bowels like the grains thereof***, compare [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] and others &gt; plural of [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֶה‎</span>] ***the entrails of it*** (i.e. the sea) [[BDB#AE|AE]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Comm.</sup> — [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὡς ὁ χοῦς τῆς γῆς</span>, whence [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּעפרותיו‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעוֺג‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוג‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעוֺז‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעֹז‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוז‎</span> (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עזז‎</span>). I, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעוֺן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְע(וֺ)נָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעוֺנֹתַי‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עון‎</span>.
